My teeth issue:

The molar tooth was infected. I went to other dentists earlier. They didn't follow the filling procedure properly. So the molar tooth was heavily infected after a few years.

Treatment:

I visited the Smile Solutions clinic after viewing the Dr. M. Srikanth profile in Practo. The doctor advised me to extract the tooth and do an implant. I told him to save the tooth. Once it was completed, the doctor grinded the tooth to measure the crown.

Let's see what happens in the future.

The cost for each treatment is reasonable at the Smile Solution dental clinic. The output is fantastic. Dr. M. Srikanth is very friendly. The way other doctors and assistants treated me was great. I am recommending this doctor for dental patients.Â 

Thank you, doctor.Â
